name: dataflex-webapis
description: DataFlex Custom Components for Web APIs
author: Jakob Kruse <kruse@kruse-net.dk>

scripts.dist: rimraf dist && copyfiles -f "%ProgramFiles%/DataFlex 24.0/Lib/WebAppMaster/Data/[Ww]eb[Aa]pp[Ss]erver[Pp]rops.*" Data && npm run build && 7z a dist/WebAPIsDemo.zip * -r -x!.git -x!.github -x!.vscode -x!CssThemes -x!DfEngine -x!*.dep -x!*.prn -x!IdeSrc/* -x!node_modules -x!*.dbg -x!*.exe -x!*.log && 7z a dist/WebAPIsComponents.zip AppHtml/Custom/* AppSrc/*API.pkg LICENSE.txt
